short_summary: Purchae of 1 Forklift and description thereof.
description: Fisheries and Oceans Canada has a requirement for One (1) Electric, 3-Wheels, Sit-down Rider Forklift Truck
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
## Title
Forklift
## Title (French)
Chariot Élévateur
## Reference Number
CB-936 487 7175121
## Amendment Number
5
## Solicitation Number
300,045.93
## Publication Date
October 18, 2023
## Tender Closing Date
October 25, 2023, at 2:00 PM
## Amendment Date
October 25, 2023
## Expected Contract Start Date
October 30, 2023
## Expected Contract End Date
March 29, 2024
## Status
Expired
## Tender Type
RFP against Supply Arrangement

## Details
The Government of Canada has issued a tender for the procurement of one (1) electric, three-wheels, sit-down rider forklift truck. This bid solicitation process is open only to suppliers who hold a Supply Arrangement under the Request (RFSA) E60HS-21FRKL/A.

## Pre-Qualification Requirements
To participate in this tender process, suppliers must be pre-qualified under the RFSA. Pre-qualification requirements can be found at the following link: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/ws4158988049-doc4159001707.

## Tender Description
The closing date for bid submissions is October 25, 2023, at 2:00 PM. The expected contract start date is October 30, 2023, and the expected contract end date is March 29, 2024. Suppliers must provide delivery of the forklift truck by March 29, 2024.

## Contact Information
For information on this tender, please contact Stephanie Patry at:

Email: [stephanie.patry@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:stephanie.patry@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
Phone: (343) 576-8973

## Tender Documents
Tender documents can be accessed at the following link: 
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22557/30004593---npp_en.pdf (English)
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22557/30004593---npp_fr.pdf (French)
